column5: so i got lucky this year and am able to head back up july 22. its been 20 years since ive been fishing the summer bite. can any one give me some tips. lures, rigs, deep-shallow, time of day. thanks bob

I always start out fishing the same way every season and the fish will be there. I start shallow and work my way out deeper until I form a pattern. Early morn and in the evneing the fish will move shallower chasing the baits fish.
